mahajan-shaikh-2020-studying.title: Studying The Effect of Emotional and Moral Language on Information Contagion during the Charlottesville Event
mahajan-shaikh-2020-studying.author: Mahajan, Khyati  and Shaikh, Samira
mahajan-shaikh-2020-studying.paperMotivationText: Investigation of the contribution of emotional and moral language towards information contagion online
mahajan-shaikh-2020-studying.paperContributionText: Shows how emotional and moral language can interact in predicting information contagion.
mahajan-shaikh-2020-studying.paperResultsText: Retweet counts on Twitter are significantly predicted by the use of negative emotions with negative moral language.
